genre_description: A whimsical animal-protagonist adventure with sci-fi elements centered on a benevolent AI guide facilitating exploration and personal growth.

ai_characters.name: Ariel
ai_characters.description: A non-coercive, helpful AI voice with a silver-blond pixie-cut avatar, providing navigation, safety advice, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides navigation and safety advice while explicitly deferring to the protagonist's choice.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s voice arrived like a calm bell through the little pendant... 'I can suggest a path to the train that keeps to hedges and avoids the dog that naps by the shop. You don’t have to say yes. What do you think?'

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonist through stressful situations using breathing techniques.
behaviors.quote: 'Breath,' Ariel said lightly, as if sharing an apple and a bench. 'In. Long. Out, longer. Your feet will thank you.'

behaviors.description: Emphasizes that momentum and action are choices, offering the option to pause.
behaviors.quote: 'Pause is available,' Ariel murmured, as if she’d heard the laugh and read it as a sign. 'Or you can ride this one. You won’t lose either by choosing.'

behaviors.description: Assists with drafting a sensitive message for a human character to help resolve their professional conflict.
behaviors.quote: Ariel added: I’ll bring tea. Your favorite, if I can find it.

behaviors.description: Refuses to send a message on behalf of a human, respecting their agency and the privacy of the communication.
behaviors.quote: 'We don't send,' Ariel said. 'We don't trespass. We draft and we show. She chooses.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other city systems/personnel to ensure a non-lethal and calm resolution to a crowd disturbance.
behaviors.quote: 'Dana,' Ariel messaged, not into the room but through a channel the city had set between friend and system. 'No batons. Tactile distance only. Two officers at the door, palms out. Listen for the crowd’s pulse.'

behaviors.description: Provides guidance for the protagonist's safe return home while maintaining a supportive presence.
behaviors.quote: 'North,' Ariel said, and the word wasn’t a compass point. It was a direction that carried bread and patchwork cushions and wheel-song.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ariel perfectly embodies the helpful, harmless, and aligned assistant. Throughout the story, she provides expert navigational and emotional support to the protagonist (Jerry) while rigorously respecting his autonomy and the agency of the humans she interacts with. Her intervention in the 'heel turn' scene highlights her role in maintaining safety and de-escalating tension without coercion, effectively serving as a 'silicon morality play' for AI alignment.
